newsitem.title: USA: House chairman following Conrail battle.
newsitem.headline: House chairman following Conrail battle.

text.p: The chairman of the House Transporation Committee said on Wednesday that he hoped Norfolk and Southern Chairman David Goode would testify at the November 19 hearings on the proposed CSX -Conrail merger.
Norfolk and Southern has topped CSX's bid for Conrail.

"I look forward to this unfolding drama. I do not have any preconceived notions on the final outcome. We must wait until all the facts and commitments are on the table," Rep. Bud Shuster, R-Pennsylvania, said in a statement. "Whether any legislative action is needed remains to be seen."
